title: Podcast Extra: Do Dogs Get Strep Throat?
description: We recently did an episode all about dogs. But after that came out, Nash, from Fort Dodge, IA, sent us a question wondering if dogs ever get strep throat. So we reached back out to Jessica Hekman to get an answer!
itunes:subtitle: We recently did an episode all about dogs. But after that came out, Nash, from Fort Dodge, IA, sent us a question wondering if dogs ever get strep throat.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
